name: ExampleEntryValidationDecimal
title: Validation of decimals
description:
### Example questionnaire for validation of decimal values  
* Specification of the input format using the [entryFormat](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-entryformat.html) extension  
* Limitation of decimal places using the [maxDecimalPlaces](https://hl7.org/fhir/extension-maxdecimalplaces.html) extension  
* Limitation of the value range using the [minValue](https://hl7.org/fhir/extension-minvalue.html) and [maxValue](https://hl7.org/fhir/extension-maxvalue.html) extensions  
* Specification of the unit to be provided using the [questionnaire-unit](https://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-questionnaire-unit.html) extension
